entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RegexKnownPatternTests.TerminationInNonBacktrackingVsBackTracking Failures on Linux ARM32 #62873
  • FileSystemWatcher on Linux uses an excessive amount of resources #62869
  • FileInfo's Attributes.HasFlag(FileAttributes.Normal) returns true for sockets #62868
  • AOT (mono-aot-cross) failure when building maccatalyst-arm64 submission test project #62865
  • CancellationToken ThrowIfCancellationRequested exceptions in documentation seems incorrect #62854
  • .NET 6 FileStream fails with System.IO.IOException: 'The parameter is incorrect' when FILE_FLAG_NO_BUFFERING used #62851
  • Consider reducing HeaderDescriptor size by using object field #62847
    Future
  • Consider using SortedList instead of Dictionary in HttpHeaders #62846
    Future
  • Consider using pooled buffers for HttpClient response buffering #62845
    Future
  • Failure in test XML parsing #62844
  • [API Proposal]: AppendOnlyList #62841
  • .NET 6.0.101 breaks GENERIC_MATH_FEATURE/PreviewFeatures functionallity #62840
  • Add Repobeats Stats to README.md #62838
  • Analyzer warning about changing underlying array of ReadOnlyMemory struct #62835
  • [API Proposal]: Low-level runtime shutdown event for critical cleanup #62834
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Arm.Sha256 APIs are unavailable on Apple Silicon #62832
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops #62829
  • Test failure MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTest.Trim(throwOnDisposed: null) #62828
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Tests.EncryptingAndDecryptingAsymmetric.AsymmetricEncryptionRoundtripUseOAEP #62827
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.BreakpointInAssemblyUsingTypeFromAnotherAssembly_BothDynamicallyLoaded` timing out #62823

Closed

  • dotnet on linux does not use available TLS 1.2 cypher #62607
    7.0.0
  • Unable to uninstall .NET Core 3.1.20 Hosting Bundle. #62853
  • Documentation missing for CA1727 and CA1848 #62826
  • .NET 6 Console App Error on Simple Http Request - 10053 An established connection was aborted... #62825
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add `System.Reflection.Metadata.Ecma335.ControlFlowBuilder.Reset`. #58765
    Future
  • ZLibStream does not seem to decompress correctly. #62858
  • Why Nullable<byte> is aligned to 8 bytes instead of 2 bytes as short does? #12977
    7.0.0
  • Struct promoted to auto-layout if it contains a non-blittable field type + explicit layout field type #44579
    Future
  • .NET 6 Android AOT fails on certain folder names #56163
    6.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][tests] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.GetSourceUsingSourceLink` failing #62551
  • Discussion: A way to prevent `Process` from configuring the terminal #62707
  • [API Proposal]: ConcurrentDictionary.TrimExcess #59324
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move 1604 docker based helix queues to 1804 #62871
    area-Infrastructure
  • WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #62870
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage tests #62867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Moved AssemblyName helpers to managed #62866
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Allow empty IGs when allocating unwind info for a fragment #62862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete several duplicate test projects under JIT/Methodical #62861
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Include Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref pack as part of 6.0.2 release #62859
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][debugger] Run getter using Runtime.GetProperties #62857
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove the varargs-based mdarray helper. #62855
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • [wasm] disable flaky http test on wasm #62852
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #62850
  • [release/6.0-maui] [MonoAOTCompiler] more properties & custom WorkingDirectory #62849
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core file version #62848
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Main loongarch64 #62843
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add docs around NativeAOT workflows #62837
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Enable NativeAOT in the CI #62833
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • OSR support for Arm64 #62831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fixing regression for AuthType.Anonymous which leads to a NullReferenceException be thrown. #62824
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices

Merged

  • Making user secrets optional by default #62821
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Unify the FlushProcessWriteBuffers mechanism for macOS arm64 / x64 #62822
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add ubuntu 21.10 to CI matrix #62783
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add ConstantExpectedAttribute #62436
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Make `ControlFlowBuilder.Clear` public. #62811
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Manifest DllImportSourceGenerator as a generator #62836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Protecting send message to debugger if it's disabled #62210
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Updated tracking issue #62814
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use wildcards for NativeAOT libs #62820
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60723
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] <EnablePreviewFeatures> for HttpStress #60682
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] View object attributes - DebugType=full #62543
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] View multidimensional array when debugging #62283
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #62286
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Caching, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Fix re-initialization of hash objects on CNG. #62403
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #62789
  • Pass HFA/HVA in registers #62623
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [6.0] Check for time-sensitive work when worker thread starvation is ongoing #61931
    area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Port #58410: Fix zero initialization use of "initReg" #62207
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Don't run the JIT formatting job in CI #61485
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make emitAddrMode xarch only #62830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Use 1ES pool instead of deprecated windows image in "Publish to Build Asset Registry" job #62839
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix method HttpHeadersNonValidated uses to get HeaderDescriptor #62194
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Fix calling NLS with Cultures has alternative sort names #62155
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Allow runtimeconfig StartupHooks and Environment StartupHooks to both be present #62124
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] [HTTP] Scavenge fix #62008
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Handle when DestroyStructure API passes null to the IL marshaller #62002
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Environment variable should override property for gcServer. #61969
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] disable sending NT Authority in TLS handshake if specific trust was specified #61713
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Disable poisoning for large structs #61601
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update libunwind to v1.6.2 #62092
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Backport all CI matrix changes from 7.0 to reelase/6.0 #62538
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [MonoAOTCompiler] more properties & custom WorkingDirectory #62725
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix source-link test #62786
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Fix types for arguments to printf calls #62796
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use 1ES pool instead of deprecated windows image in "Publish to Build Asset Registry" job #62797
    area-Infrastructure
  • IL cleanup - remove .module and make .assembly match source name #62812
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add custom marshaller tests for delegates #62691
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Improve ARM64 JIT disassembly #62557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bring over NativeAOT smoke tests #62763
  • [Infra] Revert removal of clr dependency from mono builds #62788
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add SchemeHttp index to QPACK constants #62800
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62819
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62348
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1515632 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Fix createdump failure on MacOS Monterey version 12.0.1. #62548
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Do not promote struct locals with holes #62738
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values #62798
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Backport build improvements, and fixes from #61581 #62757
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [6.0] Fix named mutexes on OSX to work between arm64 and emulated x64 processes #62765
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62769
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • Disable some suspicious tests which might lead to OOM crashes on Android emulators and arm64 devices #62767
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #61266
    Servicing-consider, area-Serialization, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Testing with NodeJs on CI #62779
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][release/6.0] Reduce number of calls to setTimer #62705
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Add support for running debugger tests CI #62431
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62716
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 6.0.x
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • [release/6.0] Add runtime-community.yml pipeline and add s390x job #62808
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
